branchCategory.name: ASR/Q, Air Saving Speed Controller
branchCategory.description: <p>AS-R/AS-Q can reduce air consumption by 25%.&nbsp; The AS-R functions to reduce return stroke pressure.&nbsp; The AS-Q functions as a rapid supply and exhaust to avoid sudden extension of piston and avoid delay in pressure charge.&nbsp; The updated AS-R/AS-Q now combines multiple adjustments to one to simplify operations.</p>
